### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_id INT,
  document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_link TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  log_entry TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_personnel (
  personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  personnel_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  personnel_role VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_audit (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  audit_date DATE,
  findings TEXT,
  recommendation TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
